attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prevent firearms including airguns and ammunition being sold in urban areas.
Outlaw the storage of firearms and ammunition in private homes.
No guns to be transported by road, rail or air.
The sale of firearms for sporting activities should only be on sale at gun clubs.
Guns for sporting purposes to be stored only in a secure place at a registered gun club.
An exemption should only be for specified work-related use, e.g. farmers.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Amend the Firearms Act."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17542


Prime Minister's Office
